cara.tests.models.test_exposure_model module

class KnownNormedconcentration(room: cara.models.Room, ventilation: cara.models._VentilationBase, infected: cara.models.InfectedPopulation, evaporation_factor: float = 0.3, normed_concentration_function: typing.Callable = <function KnownNormedconcentration.<lambda>>)

Bases: cara.models.ConcentrationModel

A ConcentrationModel which is based on pre-known exposure concentrations and which therefore doesn’t need other components. Useful for testing.

infectious_virus_removal_rate(time: float) → Union[float, numpy.ndarray]
normed_concentration_function()
state_change_times()

All time dependent entities on this model must provide information about the times at which their state changes.
